name: secrover
description: Secrover is a self-hosted travel and tour management system that includes booking, itinerary planning, and customer management through a modern web interface.

features.title: Booking Management
features.description: Handle tour reservations, availability, and customer bookings

features.title: Itinerary Planning
features.description: Create detailed travel itineraries with activities, accommodations, and transport

features.title: Customer Database
features.description: Manage customer profiles, preferences, and booking history

features.title: Payment Tracking
features.description: Record payments, deposits, and outstanding balances for bookings

features.title: Tour Packages
features.description: Define reusable tour packages with pricing, inclusions, and schedules

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Visualize bookings and availability across dates and resources

features.title: Document Generation
features.description: Create invoices, vouchers, and booking confirmations automatically

features.title: Multi
features.description: Handle international bookings with currency conversion
